title: His Pumpkin Pie
description: Pumpkin is on a plane back home for Thanksgiving when the man beside her becomes the jerk nobody wants to sit beside. When a dark and handsome Russian comes to her rescue and makes the sleazy neighbor switch seats, she's forever in his debt. Miller wasn't planning on coming back to Texas this soon, but an emergency lands him on a commercial flight with a woman that he can't keep his eyes off of. Will this chance meeting change their lives forever? It's Thanksgivingâ€¦and anything can happen! Warning: Kick your feet up on Turkey Day and escape those family judgments with a little romance.
author: Alexa Riley
